attributes.action: Make legal  a dog license to own a dog
attributes.additional_details:
Dog  attacks are rising at a rapid rate. 
This is due to 
backstreet interbreeding.
Irresponsible owners with little or no control of their animal 
A government scheme should be implemented to educate and monitor those who own dogs.
Any breed of dog has the ability to attack, if your dog attacks kills or mames then you should  be deemed unfit to own a dog.
Too many people have lost their life or had life changing injuries and by banning the breeds change nothing 
Educate the owner.
attributes.background: Government support to ensure that only responsible and competent dog owners are allowed to keep a dog what ever their breed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence
